Chafa Reference Manual

For Chafa version 1.12.5 . The latest version of this documentation can be found online at https://hpjansson.org/chafa/ref/.

Using Chafa in your Application — How to use Chafa
Chafa C API
ChafaCanvas — A canvas that renders to text
ChafaCanvasConfig — Describes a configuration for ChafaCanvas
ChafaSymbolMap — Describes a selection of textual symbols
ChafaTermDb — A database of terminal information
ChafaTermInfo — Describes a particular terminal type
Features — Platform-specific feature support
Miscellaneous — Potentially useful functions
